A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just...terrible. For several days now I have been trying to think of something positive about this movie\, but I simply can't. Every aspect of this film could have been written better. It was just lazy and pathetic storytelling which totally betrayed the mythos of Star Wars. George Lucas recieved a lot of criticism for his altering of the original movies and for the prequel trilogy\, but at least all of that was recognizably \"Star Wars\". I'm sorry George. I wish you still had control.
